name: Itadaki!
nutshell:
Tateyama Sukai has just transferred into a high school filled with "princesses" from wealthy and influential families. In her search for club activites that appeal to her love of physical activity, she comes across a mountain climbing club, and finds herself drawn into the world steep ascents under the open sky.
Author discontinued after 1 volume.

name: The Bully and the Bullied
nutshell:
Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: Couple of Mirrors
nutshell: In the Republic of China, famous Shanghainese author Xu Youyi has everything anyone could want– until the day an anonymous letter arrives, revealing the truth behind her perfect life. Betrayed by both her best friend and her husband, she meets Yan Wei, the outwardly cold but inwardly warm owner of a photography studio. They click instantly, both independent yet in harmony with one another. Growing closer in the turbulent dangers that surround them, the two different women soothe the scars within each other's heart. Will they be able to save each other?

name: DIVINE
nutshell: The sad and beautiful pasts that they hid, was their encounter by fate or a coincidence?

name: Yuutai Nova
nutshell: A young man who discovers he can have out of body experiences, which he uses at first to have fun but quickly leads him to discover that his life isn't what he thought it was, and people he knows have lives he never imagined. And then he meets this girl who has the same power and much more control...

name: Taikakusa
tags: Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,Office Workers,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
A roughly-drawn, episodic twitter comic illustrating the heartwarming daily life of a gay couple with differing physiques.
NOTE: Although this comic is relatively tame, the majority of the artist's other works are very explicit (R18+) and feature sensitive topics. That said, if you're still interested, you can find the artist at twitter.com/sorairopandaman.

name: Where is the Seven-Colored Star?
nutshell: The story of the encounter between a pirate and the child of the meteor.

name: Haikyuu!! - Insensible Fight (Doujinshi)
nutshell: The entire team knows that Hinata and Kageyama are dating. Except for Hinata and Kageyama.

name: Haikyuu!! - Kotowaru Riyuu wa Nai Daro? (Doujinshi)
Gosick
nutshell: Set in a fictional European country in 1924, a Japanese exchange student meets a mysterious, brilliant girl who only leaves the library to sleep. Her brother, a detective, relies on her mind to solve difficult mysteries, several of which draw her away from the library. With a drop of sweet romance, you will immediately become addicted to Gosick!!!

name: The Vampire Next Door
nutshell: An ordinary student coincidentally ran into a vampire, and somehow, they ended up being neighbors. Moreover, who knew that this coincidence would lead to even more mysterious stories! How would you know if people around you weren't really human?

name: Mourning Bride
nutshell:
The story centers on the four brothers of the Corsano mafia family: oldest son Alan, second son Bellini, third son Chris, and fourth son Dino.
One day the brothers get summoned at the family home by their grandfather, the Don of the family, just to learn of his death after arriving there.
His will states that Marika, their grandfather's fiancé, will be designated to choose the successor to a certain inheritance...

name: Dragon Ball AF (Tablos) (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
A DBAF story by the original artist who came up with the concept and inspired the likes of Young Jijii and Toyotaro to come up with their own.
This story involves Goku having a twin brother called Tablos, that was separated from him not long after they were born, due to the villainous Freeza.
Author's websites:
https://www.instagram.com/tablos.af/
https://www.facebook.com/TablosDBAFO/
https://af-dragonball.blogspot.com

name: The Ghostly Doctor
nutshell:
She, the leader of the hidden sect, specializes in poison and assassination. A genius, and a weirdo, in the eyes of others. After dying from an accident, she was reborn in the body of a disfigured lady. Having her identity changed and unable to return to her family, she abandoned them, but, if she doesn't take revenge on those who caused her harm, will she be worthy of the title "The Ghostly Doctor"? As clouds gather, heroes fight to be the strongest! How will she conquer the world in a red robe, and fight among the strong heroes?!
*The 2 missing chapters are announcements by the author.

name: Hajimete Kedamono Karamiau Futari
nutshell: Various smut one shots

name: Machiners
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Leiji Matsumoto, the master behind "Galaxy Express 999," "Space Pirate Captain Harlock," and many other manga masterpieces, depicts the lonely battle of Shigeru Mori, the last Japanese on earth, in this near-future suspense.
After returning to Earth from a long and arduous journey of space exploration, Mori's memory is erased by someone. All he remembers is that he is the last Japanese... Why have the Japanese disappeared? Only loneliness remains in Mori's hands as he pursues the mystery...

name: Sawatte, Tokashite
nutshell:
The cute, slightly sinful, collection of stories.


Touch Me, Melt Me
Tatsuya is a second year high school student whose tutor, and subsequently his father’s subordinant, tells him "I’m in love with you," and suddenly kisses him! Since then, even as he repels Saejima, Tatsuya is hyper-aware of him, but Saejima is constantly joking around, and Tatsuya doesn’t know how far he’s being serious.
Why is it that the mature looks on Saejima’s face make Tatsuya’s heart to throb, and feel every touch?! (from Blissful Sin)


Touch Me, Spoil Me
Continuation of chapter one.


How Do You Think I Feel
Story about two video rental coworkers, Atsushi and Tetsu.


The Stars That I See When I’m with You Are Pretty
Story about bath-house part timer Koutarou and the customer Aoi.


5-6) Flip · Flop
Brothers Kiyo and Shun have somehow become estranged from each other, what could possibly be the reason?

name: Code:Red
nutshell:
Google Translate of description found on Amazon site:
A new island born between Hokkaido and Sakhalin "Hizle I." at the beginning of the 21st century. The fire hunting yellow which goes to the vocational training school of that island is helped by the classmate Kuroe River Mizuki when encountering the bombing terrorism case. The fire hunger who admired the Kuroe as a trigger by the incident triggered a temporary entry to the "Northern Guard Corps" belonging to Kuroji … …. Girl Meets Girl's Pretty Gun Action!

name: Touken Ranbu - Kamisama na Bokura no (Doujinshi)
Renai Tripper
nutshell: Niina went back to the past and landed in 'Hakkenden's (eight dog warriors) world. There, she met Satomi clan's young master, Satomi Takemasa. According to him, Niina's the reincarnation of one of the Hakkenshi. In order to beat their worst enemy, Tamazusa, they need Niina's power?

name: Imouto ga Oshi sugiru!
nutshell:
On their youth, Shirabe Yamada encouraged her brother Minoru to become a mangaka, but years later, and now that she's a high-school-age streamer, she can barely stand him. Now a university student and amateur mangaka, Minoru does his best to keep his craft a secret from her, but on the day his manga is cancelled by the publisher, Shirabe accidentally discovers his studio at his room and that he's the mangaka 'Aoi Ringo'.
Shirabe then confesses to him: she's Ringo-sensei's dying fan!
Now (somewhat) on the same page, the siblings do everything in their power to keep the manga running!

name: Unparalleled Path - Reincarnated as the AI for a Space Battleship
nutshell: Asagaya Shin, an ordinary high school student who was supposed to be in Mitaka, Tokyo just a few days ago, somehow found himself as an AI of a space battleship. The battleship is surrounded by a large enemy fleet, and with only a few consort ships left, it is in a desperate situation. Moreover, the captain of the battleship is a young girl, a decorated member of the royal family, who was ceremoniously on board. Shin, now an AI, takes advantage of his "human" characteristics and attempts to fight a withdrawal battle using novel tactics to survive...

name: Baki: Revenge Tokyo
nutshell: Bonus stories following the convicts featured in Baki's death row inmates arc after the events of Baki's second manga. Released in the "Baki" series' 2018 shinsouban as mutual promotion with the anime.

name: Zuutto Issho ne?
nutshell:
An airheaded, bubbly highschooler is trying to cope with the loss of her best friend.
Featured on AX #64, 2008

name: Sumikko no Sora-san
nutshell: A boy returns to his family home in the country and strikes up an odd friendship with the young child who lives next door, Sora-san, who believes he is God. However, it is Plato, the boy's pet turtle, with whom Sora develops a strong bond. Plato believes Sora to be the classical Greek philosopher Socrates and calls her his teacher. Together, they ponder the mysteries and wonders of life in the quiet but beautiful countryside.

name: Donmai Princess
nutshell: What does a high school boy have to do in order to make the love of his life remember you in this lifetime? Cosplay? Host a "this is your previous life" audition? Show her all your good points? Just because she is a manga otaku in love with Blue-Sama. It's not like falling in love with manga characters is based on real life?

name: Amagami - close to you
nutshell: Discontinued after the first chapter.

name: Koi Gokoro Gekokujou
nutshell: Minori's childhood friend, Shin, has always been a crybaby and even though he's considered the charming prince of the school, Shin is still a crybaby in disguise! Minori consider him no more than a little brother, but is Shin's crybaby character his real character?

name: Neko★Mata
nutshell:
"Aren't you always thinking about that guy?!"
An arrogant Bakeneko (cat monster), named Kuro, is taken in by ordinary honor student Noeru. Kuro however leaves Noeru alone in a classroom after turning him into an erotic beauty with his powerful ero-magic.
Things get complicated when he ends up sleeping with cool guy Shouei, the person he's secretly in love with! The dutiful honor student becomes a lusty boy… Erotically sweet and troubled high school days ensue!

name: Sailor Suit and Himawari
nutshell: In order to forget her impossible love towards her foster father, she rebounds on any guy she can get her hands on (Amagi), but…??

name: Bokura no Unsei
nutshell:
Asahi might seem like your regular high school boy, but this kid's been down on his luck…his entire life! Thankfully, the sketchy but resourceful teacher, Rokujou, just so happens to have the right charm to cure Asahi of what ails him. Too bad it has to come in the form of a kiss! But when Asahi starts to want more than just a kiss, will Rokujou give in and break the delicate balance they've held so far?


Our Luck (Bokura no Unsei) (3 chapters)


The Mechanism of Love (Koi Suru Kikai)
An Aphenphosmphobic living in the mountains receive the visit of his sister who brings him… a robot?… see what happens…


The Uniform and You (Seifuku to Anata)


Uwasa no Futari (The Rumour of Two)
Oneshot prequel to the two volume manga of the same name.
